Subjective: Constipation x3 months. Hard stools, bowel movements every 2-3 days. Abdominal cramps, bloating. No blood. Weight stable, underweight. Tried olive oil with some relief. Family history: sister with ulcerative colitis.
Objective: Abdomen: Mild distension. Tenderness in LLQ. Normal bowel sounds. No masses.
Plan: Psyllium fibre sachets daily with water x6 weeks. Follow-up in 6 weeks. Monitor for worsening pain, fever, or blood in stool. Consider dietitian referral.
